languages.text: "Нити Кровавой паутины трепещут, возмущенные деяниями пробудившегося лжегероя. Священное {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро{/g} Неумирающего указывало, что он явится, и он явился. Однако теперь ему пора уйти навсегда, ибо Неумирающий желает, чтобы его нить оборвалась. И я ступаю на кровавый след".

traits.locale_text: "Нити Кровавой паутины трепещут, возмущенные деяниями пробудившегося лжегероя. Священное {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро{/g} Неумирающего указывало, что он явится, и он явился. Однако теперь ему пора уйти навсегда, ибо Неумирающий желает, чтобы его нить оборвалась. И я ступаю на кровавый след".

languages.text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."
languages.original_text: "Нити Кровавой паутины трепещут, возмущенные деяниями пробудившегося лжегероя. Священное {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро{/g} Неумирающего указывало, что он явится, и он явился. Однако теперь ему пора уйти навсегда, ибо Неумирающий желает, чтобы его нить оборвалась. И я ступаю на кровавый след".

traits.locale_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web flutter, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred Tarot of the Undying One had foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes his thread to be severed. And so I tread the Bloody Trail."

"The threads of the Bloodspun Web flutter, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred Tarot of the Undying One had foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes his thread to be severed. And so I tread the Bloody Trail."

However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."

languages.text: "Die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes zittern, erzürnt durch die Taten des erwachten falschen Streiters. Das heilige {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} des Todlosen hat vorausgesagt, dass er erscheint, und so ist es passiert. Doch nun ist es für ihn an der Zeit, unterzugehen, denn der Todlose möchte, dass sein Faden durchtrennt wird. Und so folge ich der Spur des Blutes."
languages.original_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."

traits.locale_text: "Die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes zittern, erzürnt durch die Taten des erwachten falschen Streiters. Das heilige Tarot des Todlosen hat vorausgesagt, dass er erscheint, und so ist es passiert. Doch nun ist es für ihn an der Zeit, unterzugehen, denn der Todlose möchte, dass sein Faden durchtrennt wird. Und so folge ich der Spur des Blutes."

"Die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes zittern, erzürnt durch die Taten des erwachten falschen Streiters. Das heilige Tarot des Todlosen hat vorausgesagt, dass er erscheint, und so ist es passiert. Doch nun ist es für ihn an der Zeit, unterzugehen, denn der Todlose möchte, dass sein Faden durchtrennt wird. Und so folge ich der Spur des Blutes."

languages.text: «Los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta se estremecen de furia por la perfidia del falso adalid renacido. El sagrado {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g} del Inmortal vaticinó su aparición, y así ha ocurrido. Sin embargo, ahora es él quien ha de perecer, pues el Inmortal desea que se corte su hilo. Por eso he de recorrer este rastro de sangre».
languages.original_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."

traits.locale_text: «Los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta se estremecen de furia por la perfidia del falso adalid renacido. El sagrado tarot del Inmortal vaticinó su aparición, y así ha ocurrido. Sin embargo, ahora es él quien ha de perecer, pues el Inmortal desea que se corte su hilo. Por eso he de recorrer este rastro de sangre».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸が震え、目覚めた偽りの王者の行いに怒っている。不死の者の聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}は、奴が現れると予言して、そして実際に姿を現したわ。でも今こそ奴が滅びる時よ。不死の者は奴の糸を断ち切ることを望んでいる。だから、私は血の跡を歩くの」
languages.original_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸が震え、目覚めた偽りの王者の行いに怒っている。不死の者の聖なるタロットは、奴が現れると予言して、そして実際に姿を現したわ。でも今こそ奴が滅びる時よ。不死の者は奴の糸を断ち切ることを望んでいる。だから、私は血の跡を歩くの」

languages.text: “织血罗网的丝线颤抖着，被虚假勇士的行为激怒了。不死之神的圣{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}牌{/g}预言过他会出现，而他果然出现了。不过，他的大限已经到了，因为不死之神希望我切断他的丝线。正因如此，我踏上了鲜血的道路。”
languages.original_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网的丝线颤抖着，被虚假勇士的行为激怒了。不死之神的圣牌预言过他会出现，而他果然出现了。不过，他的大限已经到了，因为不死之神希望我切断他的丝线。正因如此，我踏上了鲜血的道路。”
“织血罗网的丝线颤抖着，被虚假勇士的行为激怒了。不死之神的圣牌预言过他会出现，而他果然出现了。不过，他的大限已经到了，因为不死之神希望我切断他的丝线。正因如此，我踏上了鲜血的道路。”

languages.text: « Les fils de la Toile de Sang frémissent, révoltés par les méfaits du faux champion émergent. Le {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g} sacré avait prédit sa venue, et c'est désormais chose faite. Cependant, l'heure est venue pour lui de mourir, car l'Immortel veut que son fil soit tranché et je dois dès à présent emprunter le sentier du sang. »
languages.original_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."

traits.locale_text: « Les fils de la Toile de Sang frémissent, révoltés par les méfaits du faux champion émergent. Le tarot sacré avait prédit sa venue, et c'est désormais chose faite. Cependant, l'heure est venue pour lui de mourir, car l'Immortel veut que son fil soit tranché et je dois dès à présent emprunter le sentier du sang. »

« Les fils de la Toile de Sang frémissent, révoltés par les méfaits du faux champion émergent. Le tarot sacré avait prédit sa venue, et c'est désormais chose faite. Cependant, l'heure est venue pour lui de mourir, car l'Immortel veut que son fil soit tranché et je dois dès à présent emprunter le sentier du sang. »

languages.text: "Uyanmış sahte şampiyonun yaptıkları nedeniyle öfkelenen Kanipi Ağı'nın telleri titriyor. Ölmeyen'in kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot'u{/g} onun ortaya çıkacağını öngörmüştü, o da ortaya çıktı. Ancak yok olma zamanı geldi, Ölmeyen onun telinin koparılmasını istiyor. Ve ben de bu yüzden kan izini gözlemliyorum."
languages.original_text: "The threads of the Bloodspun Web tremble, angered by the deeds of the awakened false champion. The sacred {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} of the Undying One foretold that he would appear, and so he did. However, now is the time for him to perish, for the Undying One wishes for his thread to be severed. And so, I tread the trail of blood."
